Please find attached the 2025 Insurance Manual for Puig Emirates and Puig Arabia, along with the corresponding invoices for payment.

 

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact me.

 

Additionally, could you please share with us the local D&O policy you have through Chalhoub, for reviewing if the coverage and pricing are appropriate? We are currently conducting a review of D&O coverages across all subsidiaries, and we have conditions and pricing that would be of interest to you.

 

Thank you and regards.

chunks.text:
--------------------------------------------------
ID: CK83GP4_01
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Carmela Aggiao <Carmela.Aggiao@puigme.com>
CC: May Karaki <May.Karaki@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-29 17:10
Subject: RE: Information required for insurance invoice
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Carmela,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Please note that the D&O policy of Chalhoub is taken on the level of Chalhoub Group Limited (CGL), parent company level.

 

As such, the way the policy works is that it only covers entities which CGL has more than 50% ownership which in most cases are the managed companies.

 

As such, I doubt that the cover extends to PUIG ME/FZCO or PUIG Arabia unless the 50%+ ultimate beneficiary being CGL requirement is satisfied.

 

What I suggest is to get the offer of Remon, if premium is anything above USD 1,000 for a policy limit of between USD 3M-5M, we can check if we can include the PUIG entities to the group policy as a special case.

 

However, with the current setup, the insurance only extends to entities with more than 50% ultimate ownership by CGL.

 

Remain at your disposal should you require any further assistance.


Best Regards,

Hagop

Please note that the D&O policy of Chalhoub is taken on the level of Chalhoub Group Limited (CGL), parent company level.

 

As such, the way the policy works is that it only covers entities which CGL has more than 50% ownership which in most cases are the managed companies.

 

As such, I doubt that the cover extends to PUIG ME/FZCO or PUIG Arabia unless the 50%+ ultimate beneficiary being CGL requirement is satisfied.

 

What I suggest is to get the offer of Remon, if premium is anything above USD 1,000 for a policy limit of between USD 3M-5M, we can check if we can include the PUIG entities to the group policy as a special case.

 

However, with the current setup, the insurance only extends to entities with more than 50% ultimate ownership by CGL.

 

Remain at your disposal should you require any further assistance.

From: VIDAL, RAMON <ramon.vidal@external.puig.com <mailto:ramon.vidal@external.puig.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, May 21, 2025 2:26 PM

Subject: RE: Information required for insurance invoice

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Hi Julieta and Carmela, thank you for providing the information.

 

Please find attached the 2025 Insurance Manual for Puig Emirates and Puig Arabia, along with the corresponding invoices for payment.

 

If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact me.

 

Additionally, could you please share with us the local D&O policy you have through Chalhoub, for reviewing if the coverage and pricing are appropriate? We are currently conducting a review of D&O coverages across all subsidiaries, and we have conditions and pricing that would be of interest to you.

 

Thank you and regards.
